section.title: Testing card keywords source repository integration
section.p: Before you begin, you must know the number of a card that has been referenced in a source commit message, e.g. Fixed bug 123.

steps.item: Sign in to Mingle as a project administrator and open the project you want to change (if you're not already working in the project).

item.p: Mingle displays the Project settings page.
item.note: if you are logged in as a project team member, Mingle displays the Team page.

item.p: Mingle displays the Card keywords page.
Type the number of a card that you know has been referenced in a source commit message.

screenshot.alttext: Card keyword page - test source repository integration

item.p: Mingle displays the last 10 changesets/revisions that match the current keywords for this story. If you get the results you expect, this means you've selected good card keywords and Mingle is picking them up in commit messages.

screenshot.alttext: Card keyword page - test source repository integration results

item.p: If you don't see any matches, or not as many as you would expect, try adding different keywords and repeating.

item.note: Don't forget to click the Update keywords link to save your card keywords if you haven't done so already.
